name: Betsfy
description: In Betsfy, users, tipsters, professional coaches, and bookmakers interact by offering free or paid information and services for use or subscription.  These are the main characteristics:  - It allows you to publish content, images, videos and audio clips (such as regular social networks), as well as forecasts and announcements of free or paid services by use or subscription.  - It offers a specific and limitless medium for the relationship between bettors, tipsters and bookmakers.  - It gives the opportunity to become Premium tipster and earn money with the tipsters bets and advice.  - It allows registered users to monetize their recommendations and charge for services and subscriptions.  - It allows you to discover the best offers from bookmakers through a profile of promotions and bonuses.  - It provides information on major sporting events.  - It allows filtering the content according to the users tastes (by sports, countries, competitions, etc.).  Betsfy is in the development phase. Other features, that will improve the use and possibilities of the social network, will also be available soon.
